articles.title: "Proposal Came From...": India Batting Coach On Shubman Gill Playing No. 3 In 1st Test - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India won the first Test against the West Indies by an innings and 141 runs but Gill's first game as No. 3, replacing the dogged Cheteshwar Pujara, didn't start well.
